id.description: A unique string used for identification.

ref.description: Reference to a panel definition's id from a tool configuration.

file.description: The relative path to the file that is displayed by the panel.

editorActivity.description: For tools that create editor instances e.g. language workbenches, reference to the id of the activity that contains the editor.

editorPanel.description: For tools that create editor instances e.g. language workbenches, reference to the id of a panel of editorActivity that is the editor instance.
